sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Blue-Ribbon Commission on Transportation Infrastructure Funding and Policy Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Blue-Ribbon Commission on Transportation Infrastructure Funding and Policy Act.

sections.heading: Findings. The General Assembly finds the following:
sections.text: Findings. The General Assembly finds the following:

sections.heading: Meetings. The Commission shall hold its first meeting by July 31, 2023
sections.text: The Commission may conduct meetings at such places and at such times as it may deem necessary or convenient to enable it to exercise fully and effectively its powers, perform its duties, and accomplish its objectives and purpose

sections.heading: Duties. The Commission shall evaluate Illinois' existing transportation infrastructure funding and policy processes and develop alternative solutions

Report. The Commission shall direct the Illinois Department of Transportation to enter into a contract with a third party to assist the Commission in producing a document that evaluates the topics under this Act and outline formal recommendations that can be acted upon by the General Assembly
Repeal. This Commission is dissolved, and this Act is repealed, on August 1, 2025.
sections.text: Repeal. This Commission is dissolved, and this Act is repealed, on August 1, 2025.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
